articles.description: The company's board has approved the sale of BPCL equity shares which are held by the BPCL Trust for Investment in shares through accelerated book built offering
articles.content: Shares of Bharat Petroleum Corporation (BPCL) dipped 6 per cent to Rs 438 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) in intra-day trade on Tuesday after BPCL Trust for Investment in Shares (BPCL Trust) sol… [+2845 chars]

articles.title: Craftsman Automation to launch IPO on March 15, price band fixed at Rs 1,488-1,490 - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Craftsman Automation will utilise net fresh issue funds for debt repayment, while the offer for sale money will go to selling shareholders.
articles.content: Diversified engineering company, Craftsman Automation will launch its initial public offering (IPO) on March 15. The price band for the same has been fixed at Rs 1,488-1,490 per share, according to m… [+2201 chars]
